title.narrative: DATA AND EVIDENCE

description.narrative: Increased capacity of government in selected areas to collect, compile, analyse and utilize sex- and other disaggregated child protection data for planning, policy, programme and budgetary action., which contributes to Access To Justice, Child Protection Systems, Child Protection â€“ General, Child Protection â€“ Strengthen Families And Communities, Data And Child Protection, Prevention And Response Services For Violence Against Children, Violence, Exploitation And Abuse. UNICEF aims to achieve this through Developing And Leveraging Resources And Partnerships, Evaluations, Research And Data, Operational Support To Programme Delivery, Systems Strengthening And Institution Building. This contributes to the following Country Programme result: By 2020, girls and boys in China, especially the most disadvantaged, increasingly benefit from an equitable and integrated child protection system, including in humanitarian situations.

condition.narrative: Should contribute directly to results for children as outlined in the UNDAF, national results and/or UNICEF Strategic Plan and within the scope defined in the CPD, CPAP, OMP or other agreed upon programme documents

title.narrative: Increased capacity of government in selected areas to collect, compile, analyse and utilize sex- and other disaggregated childprotection data for planning, policy, programme and budgetary action.

description.narrative: In 2020, UNICEF provided continuous support to China CDC for conducting the provincial VACS in Zhejiang Province, with preliminary results of the provincial VACS generated. A large-scale study on children’s use of the Internet was completed in 2020 to inform future policy advocacy and industry engagement. | Status:Constrained | As-of Date:02/02/2021

title.narrative: Percent of UNICEF-supported pilot sites with an operational Child Protection Information Management System(45372)
The collection of data on violence exploitation and abuse in the country is available on an ad-hoc basis (including one off surveys)

target.value: 2020:A plan is in place to implement a national VACS.

actual.value: 2020:Although a discussion has taken place with CDC (national and some provincial CDCs), there is no plan in place for a national survey. Data analysis and report writing of Zhejiang provincial survey is under way.
